ats_utilities.config.ini package¶

Submodules¶

  • ats_utilities.config.ini.ini2object module
  • ats_utilities.config.ini.object2ini module

Module contents¶

Convert configuration from a ini file to an object and vice versa. Configuration structure composed of sections, properties, and values.

[section1] key_1 = value_1, …, key_n = value_n
